top_comments.comment: Only swedish and finnish will know what EI SAA PEITTÄÄ means.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Flowers in an Iskall base?!
Shouldn't be too long before he starts using unpolished diorite in his builds.

"I'm Omega happy with this" 
HE SAID IT. HE SAID THE WORD, THE BESTEST GOODEST WORD. HE SAID HE'S *OMEGA* HAPPY, I'M SO HAPPY HE'S HAPPY
seriously though, it does look great
Could also use rooted dirt to give more variation in the pathway build
As a finnish im so proud of how you said terve!!

Hey iskall, it's been a while since your modpack vault hunters came out and I've tried downloading it many times but every time I open it it has way too many lags for my computer, and even for the best computer in my house, and it's a good one. So I've been wandering, will you consider making a light version of the modpack maybe with some less mods or something, because for us downloading mods one by one may lead to a lot of confusion and errors, so for us, the players/watchers with not the best computers, will you consider making a light version of vault hunters?
